properties.areaDesc: Elbert, GA; Madison, GA; Oglethorpe, GA
properties.headline: Flood Warning issued February 6 at 8:15PM EST until February 7 at 10:04PM EST by NWS Peachtree City GA
properties.description:
...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Georgia...

Broad River near Carlton affecting Elbert...Madison and Oglethorpe
Counties

The Flood Warning continues for
The Broad River near Carlton.
* Until Friday evening.
* At 745 PM Thursday the stage was 21.7 feet, and rising.
* Minor flooding is occurring, and minor flooding is forecast to
continue.
* Flood stage is 15 feet.
* The river will continue rising, reaching near 24 feet by after
midnight early Friday morning. The river is expected to fall below
flood stage Friday afternoon.
* At 21 feet, minor flooding expands further into the woodlands and
fields along the river. A sand dredge operation on the left bank
near the gage will be flooded out. Large portions of Roy Wood Road
and the Broad River Outpost for Canoes and Kayaks location will be
under several feet of water. Flooding expands over the yard behind
an assisted living home off of Roy Wood Road.

At 24 feet, minor flooding expands even further into the woodlands
and fields along the river. A sand dredge operation on the left bank
near the gage will be completely under water. Large portions of Roy
Wood Road and the Broad River Outpost for Canoes and Kayaks location
will be under several feet of water. Flooding expands up the
backyard of an assisted living home off of Roy Wood Road.

NWSheadline: Flood Warning extended until Friday evening
